text: <@U7P6G42AX> Still having problems with display conditions in repeating groups - Anyone else confirm?
The fix is in a PR still so it's not up yet :slightly_smiling_face:
I'm getting an issue when cloning a stylesheet but I don't have any of what the error message shows.

*I mean I'm following what the error message shows. I noticed when I cloned it the original name that HubSpot pre-populated had a space in it and then the word copy. It showed the error when the modal loaded.
A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
That removed the error and let me click Clone but didn't look like it actually cloned or did anything.
huh, well…. I’d open a ticket
update - the PR was merged, im hoping to get the changes deployed to the page editor and the design manager today
<@U7P6G42AX> thanks for the update - just let us know when it's a green light for us to check
actually it looks like the page editor was just deployed, give it a whirl!
it probably wont work in the design manager just yet though, will let you guys know when it should
Works for me - thanks for the responsiveness on this . When you say it "won't work in the design manager yet" what do you mean exactly?
i mean this bug might still happen for modules in the Design Manager until my changes go live for that app
:thumbsup: ok - thanks for the heads up
Seems to have fixed the issue over here. Thank you so much!
